meanings.definition: The state or quality of being fat.
meanings.sent1: Her fatness made it difficult for her to fit into the small chair.
meanings.sent2: The doctor advised him to watch his fatness to improve his health.
meanings.sent3: Despite her fatness, she was always the fastest runner in the group.
meanings.sent4: The fatness of the wallet indicated it was full of money.
meanings.sent5: The fatness of the bear startled the hikers on the trail.

meanings.definition: The amount of fat in a person or animal.
meanings.sent1: The cat's fatness was a result of overeating.
meanings.sent2: The nutritionist measured the fatness of the patient to assess their diet.
meanings.sent3: The fatness of the steak made it irresistible to the hungry dog.
meanings.sent4: The fatness of the milk indicated its richness.
meanings.sent5: The fatness of the bacon sizzled in the pan.

meanings.sent1: The fatness of the crowd at the concert made it hard to find a seat.
meanings.sent2: The fatness of the bookshelves displayed the owner's love for reading.
meanings.sent3: The fatness of the traffic jam caused delays for hours.
meanings.sent4: The fatness of the tree's branches provided ample shade.
meanings.sent5: The fatness of the buffet spread delighted the guests at the party.
